title: Battle Castles - 500 Years of Knights and Siege Warfare - Gooner
description:
Battle Castles - 500 Years of Knights and Siege Warfare (2013) (Epub & Mobi) Gooner

Publisher: HarperPress (September 27, 2012)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0007455585
ISBN-13: 978-0007455584

Join TVâ€™s Dan Snow as the fully illustrated â€˜Battle Castlesâ€™ brings to thrilling life a cavalcade of medieval fortifications and the clashes that turned empires to dust and mortals into legends.

Castles and their ruins still dominate the landscape and are a constant reminder to us of a time when violence, or the threat of it, was the norm.

Dan Snow explores the worldâ€™s greatest medieval castles: from Dover Castle to ChÃ¢teau Gaillard, Richard Iâ€™s fortress in Normandy, and Castillo de Gibalfaro, the last vanguard of Moorish rule in Spain, to Krak des Chevaliers in Syria â€“ an astounding feat of engineering by the Crusaders.

Each castleâ€™s story is dramatically recounted: the building techniques, the weapons used and daily life within the walls. Spanning the globe, and using the latest CGI reconstructions, Dan Snow gets to the very heart of the bloodshed and battles of the greatest fortresses of the Middle Ages
